trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
This class cannot be inherited.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> whenever an activity status event occurs.

Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance.

An ActivityTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type.
> [!NOTE] > A single ActivityTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.

You add ActivityTrackingLocation objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> in order to define the match parameters for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.

You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.
You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type.

You may add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> to specify the activity status events to be matched.

You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions.
For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class.

If you use the default constructor and you do not explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code, then if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> is later used on your tracking profile an exception will be thrown.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the specified activity name.
You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> is set to `activityTypeName`.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the specified reference activity type.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> is set to `activityType`.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `ExecutionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has the specified reference activity type and matches the specified activity execution status events.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
-or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is"CodeActivity".
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.|
The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has the specified reference activity type, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.|
The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
-or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the reference activity to be matched.

You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or ActivityType for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
If you want to specify the reference activity type in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
The <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
Gets or sets the unqualified name of the reference activity type for the location.
You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity set ActivityTypeName to "CodeActivity".
ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML.
ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type.

You must specify either the ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
The unqualified name of the reference activity type.
Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched.

For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to"CodeActivity" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".

Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be `true` and one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
The default is an empty collection.
Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.
ExecutionStatusEvents specifies the activity status events for which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> can be matched.

One of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in ExecutionStatusEvents must be matched and every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
The default is an empty list.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type of the location should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
